thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Michael Williams

author: Michael Williams
title: Michael Williams
text: I have had Hoselink fittings on one of my hoses since the very late 1990s and it was and still is great. I have used other fittings over the years and finally got fed up with leaks and blow outs so I was excited when I saw a Hoselink ad on TV. I thought you couldn't get them anymore. So I ordered on-line and with in a week have solved all my hose problems around the house. Even picked up a nice automatic dog water bowl for the puppies!
